DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the safety and immunogenicity of different combinations of A/H1N1 S-OIV (swine flu) vaccine in healthy young children.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Immunogenicity of A/H1N1-SOIV (Swine Flu) Vaccine With and Without Adjuvant in Children (3 to < 9 Years)
DOC.criteria: Children 3 to < 9 years of age in good health as determined by medical history, physical assessment and clinical judgement of the investigator and without influenza within the past 6 months. History of serious disease. History of serious reaction following administration of vaccine or hypersensitivity to vaccine components. Known or suspected impairment/alteration of immune function. Receipt or planned receipt of seasonal trivalent influenza vaccine within 1 week before or after each study vaccination. For additional entry criteria, please refer to protocol.
